Plot: After eight long years since his beloved wife's hideous murder, unexpectedly, an accidental discovery of two bodies near a Doctor's estate will stir things again in a long-forgotten buried case that nothing is as it appears.
Title: Tell No One
Writer: Guillaume Canet, Harlan Coben (novel), Philippe Lefebvre
Actors: François Cluzet, Marie-Josée Croze, André Dussollier, Kristin Scott Thomas
